Title: Series: Recueil Basan
Description: The rest on the flight into Egypt; seated Holy Family; posthumous eighth state with extensive and crude re-work, before the hightlight on the branch has been brought down further and the Virgin and Child have been shaded completely; from an edition of the Recueil published by Henri Louis Basan around 1810. 1645 Etching and drypoint
Producer name: Print made by: Henri Louis Basan (workshop re-work)
Curator's comments: For an impression of the first state and comment see 1868,0822.663. For comment on the volume, which was published by Henri Louis Basan around 1810, see 1941,0327.11.1
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (216.VIII) (Rembrandt)
Hind 1923 / A Catalogue of Rembrandt's Etchings; chronologically arranged and completely illustrated (208.IV)
White & Boon 1969 / Rembrandt's Etchings: An Illustrated Critical Catalogue (57.IV)
